Virtual Coffee Series //

Leaders Adapt to the New Normal

Where business leaders can share experiences and ideas to help each other adapt to the new realities we’re all facing on topics, such as virtual work, online sales, the CARES Act, and more.

8.21.20 Latest Updates to SBA’s Paycheck Protection Program Loan Forgiveness

Download Presentations
Watch Video

Join us for our virtual coffee to hear Rod Johnson of the US Small Business Administration share the latest updates to the SBA’s Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) Loan Forgiveness. He’ll walk you through how loan forgiveness works and answer your questions on existing and new SBA programs. Our panel of legal and financial experts will probe into the pressing questions business leaders need answers to.

Have a specific question you’d like answered? Share your questions as you register so our panelists can tailor the discussion to what matters most.

For business owners and senior leaders to maintain a peer environment

Speakers & Panelists

Roderick Johnson

Lender Relations,
US Small Business Administration

Lane Hornfeck

Partner,
Shulman Rogers

Wendy Kessell

CEO,
CFO ReStart

Stuart Sorkin

Founder,
Business & Legal Advisors

Ken Fischer

CEO,
Atigro
